segments.text: This is Manager Liang's office , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Wang Miao from AB company speaking . Our CEO Mr . Green has an appointment with Mr . Liang tomorrow morning . But there is a minor change in tomorrow's schedule . Mr . Green has an abrupt urgent case tomorrow and he has to go abroad today . He wanted me to convey his apology to Mr . Wang .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And Mr . Green will make another appointment when Mr . Wang comes back .
segments.speaker: S2
